snippet: Ben Howell, a walk-on at Alabama who is now second string on both the kickoff and punt return teams for his senior season, has been a part of two national championship teams.
abstract: Ben Howell, walk-on football player at Alabama, is now second string on both kickoff and punt return teams for his senior season; has been part of two national championship football teams.
lead_paragraph: Ben Howell, a walk-on at Alabama who is now second string on both the kickoff and punt return teams for his senior season, has been a part of two national championship teams.

headline.seo: At Alabama, Ben Howell Never Walked Away From His Chance
headline.main: Prizing the Tide, a Local Player Fulfills a Dream
headline.print_headline: Prizing the Tide, A Local Player Fulfills a Dream
